definition: all walks of life/all social circles

sentences.english: The Company always welcome friends from all walks of life come to guide negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 本公司隨時歡迎各界朋友親臨指導洽談。

sentences.english: Japanese community in shock, has begun relief efforts.
sentences.chinese: 日本社會各界在震驚之餘，已開始全力抗震救災。

sentences.english: Shocking the mathematical circles, it also arouses far-fLung and fervency interest all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 震撼數學界的歷史事件引起世界各界廣泛熱烈關注。

sentences.english: Mr. Yang Dongtang, the chairman, cordial welcome personalities from all walks of life to visit our company.
sentences.chinese: 董事長楊東堂先生誠摯歡迎各界人士蒞臨導。

sentences.english: A warm welcome society all sections of the people joins hands , shows great plans together.
sentences.chinese: 熱情歡迎社會各界人士攜手合作，共展宏圖。

sentences.english: People who want to improve their English levels in a short time.
sentences.chinese: 想在短時刻內進步外語水平的各界人士。

sentences.english: Premier Wen attached great importance to the engagement and communication with the people from all walks of life.
sentences.chinese: 溫家寶總理非常重視同兩國各界民衆的溝通交流。

sentences.english: Maintaining close community ties through participating wide-ranging activities.
sentences.chinese: 旅發局透過參與不同活動，與社會各界保持連繫。

sentences.english: The delegation met with people from all walks of life.
sentences.chinese: 代表團接觸了各界人士。

sentences.english: We would like to be friends with the support and endorsement .
sentences.chinese: 願我們的努力得到各界朋友的支持和認可。

sentences.english: We would like to cooperate with all of you friends and look forward to developing with your help.
sentences.chinese: 願與社會各界朋友真誠合作，共商發展大計。

sentences.english: Dinggu Enterprise is ready to keep pace with the times, and create a wonderful future together with people of aall circles.
sentences.chinese: 頂固企業願與社會各界人士與時俱進，共創美好將來。

sentences.english: The appearance of the automated collection bus causes a hot discussion in all walks of life.
sentences.chinese: 無人售票車的出現引發了各界人士的熱烈討論。

sentences.english: Won a good social transcript of the letter, received by the owners of all walks of life and well received.
sentences.chinese: 贏得了良好的社會信謄，深受業主和各界的好評。

sentences.english: We sincerely welcome friends from various circles at home and abroad visit the guide and experiment.
sentences.chinese: 竭誠歡迎海內外各界朋友親臨指導與實驗。

sentences.english: All the achievements are results of care and efforts by the leaders of the two states. The social communities including the media also made important contribution.
sentences.chinese: 兩國社會各界，包括新聞界也作出了重要貢獻。

definition: all parties (in a dispute etc)/all sides/all directions
to call on (sb to do sth)/to appeal (to)/an appeal
domestic and international/at home and abroad
to cooperate on a great undertaking or joint project
